data.meanings: To be handsome, make good, seem good or beautiful, be excellent.
data.sentence: The word وَحُسْنَ comes from the root ح س ن and is associated with the meanings: To be handsome, make good, seem good or beautiful, be excellent.

data.meanings: Inda: Preposition: here, with, by, at the point of, about, from, in the presence of. The word denotes the idea of nearness, whether it be actual in the sense of possession or ideational, it also denotes a sense of rank or dignity or opinion, time and place.
data.sentence: The word عِنْدَنَا comes from the root ع ن د and is associated with the meanings: Inda: Preposition: here, with, by, at the point of, about, from, in the presence of. The word denotes the idea of nearness, whether it be actual in the sense of possession or ideational, it also denotes a sense of rank or dignity or opinion, time and place.

data.meanings: to come back from, repent, set (stars), repeat, return (from disobedience to obedience), echo, alight at night.
data.sentence: The word مَءَابٍ comes from the root ا و ب and is associated with the meanings: to come back from, repent, set (stars), repeat, return (from disobedience to obedience), echo, alight at night.
The word لَزُلْفَى comes from the root ز ل ف and is associated with the meanings: draw near/close, advance, nearness/closeness/proximity
